15.name: Luxurious Wool Designer Beachwear Outfit
15.description: A high-end beachwear outfit made from premium quality wool. This outfit is designed by a renowned designer, offering the perfect blend of elegance and comfort. With meticulous details and impeccable craftsmanship, this outfit is the ultimate choice for those seeking luxury and style on the beach.
